thread.title: Bears’ rout of Patriots was an all-time great performance
thread.title_full: Bears’ rout of Patriots was an all-time great performance - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Bears’ rout of Patriots was an all-time great performance
text:
Photo: Phil Sandlin, AP ** FILE ** Chicago Bears head coach Mike Ditka is carried off the field by Steve McMichael, left, and William Perry after the Bears win Super Bowl XX in New Orleans, La., in this Jan. 26, 1986 file photo. The Bears' Willie Gault (83) and Maury Buford (8) join in celebrating their 46-10 victory over the New England Patriots. (AP Photo/Phil Sandlin) Ran on: 02-04-2007 Coach Mike Ditka is carried off the field by Steve McMichael (left) and William Perry after the Bears win Super Bowl XX, routing New England 46-10 in New Orleans on Jan. 26, 1986. ** FILE ** Chicago Bears head coach Mike Ditka is carried off the...
If ever a team needed to win the Super Bowl simply to avoid abject embarrassment, it was the 1985 Chicago Bears. ** FILE ** Chicago Bears head coach Mike Ditka is carried off the field by Steve McMichael, left, and William Perry after the Bears win Super Bowl XX in New Orleans, La., in this Jan. 26, 1986 file photo. The Bears' Willie Gault (83) and Maury Buford (8) join in celebrating their 46-10 victory over the New England Patriots. (AP Photo/Phil Sandlin) Ran on: 02-04-2007 Coach Mike Ditka is carried off the field by Steve McMichael (left) and William Perry after the Bears win Super Bowl XX, routing New England 46-10 in New Orleans on Jan. 26, 1986. ** FILE ** Chicago Bears head coach Mike Ditka is carried off the...
If ever a team needed to win the Super Bowl simply to avoid abject embarrassment, it was the 1985 Chicago Bears.
